languages.text: Долг развел пути магоса Ханейманна и маршала Антара. Во время их последней встречи Паскаль внес в конструкцию Глейто последнее изменение, кратно увеличив срок службы кибермастиффа. Доподлинно не известно, повлиял ли этот дар на Соломона, но близость верного пса не раз спасала его в самые черные дни.

Duty demanded that Magos Haneumann and Marshal Anthar part ways. During their last meeting, Pasqal made a few final modifications to Glaito's design, increasing the cyber-mastiff's service life severalfold. Whether the gift had any impact on Solomorne is uncertain, but on more than one occasion, having his faithful dog at his side would turn out to be his salvation in even the darkest of days.
languages.original_text: Долг развел пути магоса Ханейманна и маршала Антара. Во время их последней встречи Паскаль внес в конструкцию Глейто последнее изменение, кратно увеличив срок службы кибермастиффа. Доподлинно не известно, повлиял ли этот дар на Соломона, но близость верного пса не раз спасала его в самые черные дни.

traits.locale_text: Duty demanded that Magos Haneumann and Marshal Anthar part ways. During their last meeting, Pasqal made final modifications to Glaito's design, increasing the cyber-mastiff's service life severalfold. Whether the gift had any influence on Solomorne is uncertain, but more than once, having his faithful dog at his side would be his salvation in the darkest of days.

Duty demanded that Magos Haneumann and Marshal Anthar part ways. During their last meeting, Pasqal made final modifications to Glaito's design, increasing the cyber-mastiff's service life severalfold. Whether the gift had any influence on Solomorne is uncertain, but more than once, having his faithful dog at his side would be his salvation in the darkest of days.

Duty demanded that Magos Haneumann and Marshal Anthar part ways. During their last meeting, Pasqal made a few final modifications to Glaito's design, increasing the cyber-mastiff's service life severalfold. Whether the gift had any impact on Solomorne is uncertain, but on more than one occasion, having his faithful dog at his side would turn out to be his salvation in even the darkest of days.

Duty demanded that Magos Haneumann and Marshal Anthar part ways. During their last meeting, Pasqal made a few final modifications to Glaito's design, increasing the cyber-mastiff's service life severalfold. Whether the gift had any impact on Solomorne is uncertain, but on more than one occasion, having his faithful dog at his side would turn out to be his salvation in even the darkest of days.

Duty demanded that Magos Haneumann and Marshal Anthar part ways. During their last meeting, Pasqal made a few final modifications to Glaito's design, increasing the cyber-mastiff's service life severalfold. Whether the gift had any impact on Solomorne is uncertain, but on more than one occasion, having his faithful dog at his side would turn out to be his salvation in even the darkest of days.

Duty demanded that Magos Haneumann and Marshal Anthar part ways. During their last meeting, Pasqal made a few final modifications to Glaito's design, increasing the cyber-mastiff's service life severalfold. Whether the gift had any impact on Solomorne is uncertain, but on more than one occasion, having his faithful dog at his side would turn out to be his salvation in even the darkest of days.

languages.text: Die Pflicht verlangte, dass die Wege von Magos Haneumann und Marschall Anthar sich trennen mussten. Bei ihrem letzten Treffen nahm Pasqal einige finale Modifikationen an Glaito vor und erhöhte somit die Dienstzeit des Cyber-Mastiffs um ein Vielfaches. Ob das Geschenk irgendeine Regung bei Solomorne auslöste, ist unklar, aber es erwies sich mehr als einmal als seine Rettung, dass der treue Hund selbst an dunkelsten Tagen an seiner Seite war.
languages.original_text: Duty demanded that Magos Haneumann and Marshal Anthar part ways. During their last meeting, Pasqal made a few final modifications to Glaito's design, increasing the cyber-mastiff's service life severalfold. Whether the gift had any impact on Solomorne is uncertain, but on more than one occasion, having his faithful dog at his side would turn out to be his salvation in even the darkest of days.

traits.locale_text: Die Pflicht verlangte, dass die Wege von Magos Haneumann und Marschall Anthar sich trennen mussten. Bei ihrem letzten Treffen nahm Pasqal einige finale Modifikationen an Glaito vor und erhöhte somit die Dienstzeit des Cyber-Mastiffs um ein Vielfaches. Ob das Geschenk irgendeine Regung bei Solomorne auslöste, ist unklar, aber es erwies sich mehr als einmal als seine Rettung, dass der treue Hund selbst an dunkelsten Tagen an seiner Seite war.

languages.text: Le devoir exigeait que le magos Haneumann et le maréchal Anthar suivent chacun leur propre chemin. Lors de leur dernière rencontre, Pasqal apporta quelques ultimes modifications à Glaito pour prolonger la vie du cyber-mastiff. Nul ne saurait dire si ce simple présent a eu un véritable impact sur Solomorne, mais dans les jours les plus sombres, il est arrivé plus d'une fois que la présence de son fidèle compagnon à ses côtés lui apporte le salut.
languages.original_text: Duty demanded that Magos Haneumann and Marshal Anthar part ways. During their last meeting, Pasqal made a few final modifications to Glaito's design, increasing the cyber-mastiff's service life severalfold. Whether the gift had any impact on Solomorne is uncertain, but on more than one occasion, having his faithful dog at his side would turn out to be his salvation in even the darkest of days.

traits.locale_text: Le devoir exigeait que le magos Haneumann et le maréchal Anthar suivent chacun leur propre chemin. Lors de leur dernière rencontre, Pasqal apporta quelques ultimes modifications à Glaito pour prolonger la vie du cyber-mastiff. Nul ne saurait dire si ce simple présent a eu un véritable impact sur Solomorne, mais dans les jours les plus sombres, il est arrivé plus d'une fois que la présence de son fidèle compagnon à ses côtés lui apporte le salut.

languages.text: 由于职责所在，哈努曼贤者与安萨元帅不得不分道扬镳。两人最后一次会面期间，帕斯卡对格雷托的设计进行了修改，将这只生化獒犬的寿命延长了好几倍。这件礼物是否对索罗蒙造成了影响仍旧不得而知，但不止一次，在索罗蒙人生最黑暗的日子里，这条忠心耿耿的生化獒犬为他带来了救赎。
languages.original_text: Duty demanded that Magos Haneumann and Marshal Anthar part ways. During their last meeting, Pasqal made a few final modifications to Glaito's design, increasing the cyber-mastiff's service life severalfold. Whether the gift had any impact on Solomorne is uncertain, but on more than one occasion, having his faithful dog at his side would turn out to be his salvation in even the darkest of days.

traits.locale_text: 由于职责所在，哈努曼贤者与安萨元帅不得不分道扬镳。两人最后一次会面期间，帕斯卡对格雷托的设计进行了修改，将这只生化獒犬的寿命延长了好几倍。这件礼物是否对索罗蒙造成了影响仍旧不得而知，但不止一次，在索罗蒙人生最黑暗的日子里，这条忠心耿耿的生化獒犬为他带来了救赎。

languages.text: El deber exigió que el magos Haneumann y el Mariscal Anthar siguieran caminos separados. En su último encuentro, Pasqal realizó unas últimas modificaciones al diseño de Glaito, extendiendo así en gran medida la vida útil del cibermastín. No se sabe si el regalo tuvo impacto sobre Solomorne, pero, en más de una ocasión, su fiel compañero le salvó en los momentos más desesperados.
languages.original_text: Duty demanded that Magos Haneumann and Marshal Anthar part ways. During their last meeting, Pasqal made a few final modifications to Glaito's design, increasing the cyber-mastiff's service life severalfold. Whether the gift had any impact on Solomorne is uncertain, but on more than one occasion, having his faithful dog at his side would turn out to be his salvation in even the darkest of days.

traits.locale_text: El deber exigió que el magos Haneumann y el Mariscal Anthar siguieran caminos separados. En su último encuentro, Pasqal realizó unas últimas modificaciones al diseño de Glaito, extendiendo así en gran medida la vida útil del cibermastín. No se sabe si el regalo tuvo impacto sobre Solomorne, pero, en más de una ocasión, su fiel compañero le salvó en los momentos más desesperados.

languages.text: 義務により、マゴス・ヘニュマンとアンサール将帥は別れを告げることになった。彼らの最後の会合の際、パスカルはグライトの設計にいくつか最終的な改良を加え、サイバーマスチフの稼働寿命を数倍に延ばした。この贈り物がソロモーンにどのような影響を与えたかは定かではないが、忠実な犬をそばに置くことが、彼の最も暗い日々において何度も救いとなったことは間違いない。
languages.original_text: Duty demanded that Magos Haneumann and Marshal Anthar part ways. During their last meeting, Pasqal made a few final modifications to Glaito's design, increasing the cyber-mastiff's service life severalfold. Whether the gift had any impact on Solomorne is uncertain, but on more than one occasion, having his faithful dog at his side would turn out to be his salvation in even the darkest of days.

traits.locale_text: 義務により、マゴス・ヘニュマンとアンサール将帥は別れを告げることになった。彼らの最後の会合の際、パスカルはグライトの設計にいくつか最終的な改良を加え、サイバーマスチフの稼働寿命を数倍に延ばした。この贈り物がソロモーンにどのような影響を与えたかは定かではないが、忠実な犬をそばに置くことが、彼の最も暗い日々において何度も救いとなったことは間違いない。

languages.text: Vazifenin gerektirdiği üzere Magos Haneumann ve Miralay Anthar'ın yolları ayrıldı. Son görüşmelerinde Pasqal, Glaito'nun tasarımında son birkaç değişiklik yaparak siber mastifin hizmet ömrünü katbekat artırdı. Bu hediyenin Solomorne'u nasıl etkilediği meçhuldü ancak sadık köpeğinin yanı başında olması, en karanlık günlerde bile pek çok kez hayata tutunabilmesini sağlayacaktı.
languages.original_text: Duty demanded that Magos Haneumann and Marshal Anthar part ways. During their last meeting, Pasqal made a few final modifications to Glaito's design, increasing the cyber-mastiff's service life severalfold. Whether the gift had any impact on Solomorne is uncertain, but on more than one occasion, having his faithful dog at his side would turn out to be his salvation in even the darkest of days.

traits.locale_text: Vazifenin gerektirdiği üzere Magos Haneumann ve Miralay Anthar'ın yolları ayrıldı. Son görüşmelerinde Pasqal, Glaito'nun tasarımında son birkaç değişiklik yaparak siber mastifin hizmet ömrünü katbekat artırdı. Bu hediyenin Solomorne'u nasıl etkilediği meçhuldü ancak sadık köpeğinin yanı başında olması, en karanlık günlerde bile pek çok kez hayata tutunabilmesini sağlayacaktı.
